sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable react-hooks/exhaustive-deps */ import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from 'react' import AuthContext from '../../context/autenticacion/AuthContext' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import service from '../../config/axios' export default function Proyectos(props) { // Extraer la info de autenticaciÃ³n const authContext = useContext(AuthContext) const { usuario, usuarioAutenticado } = authContext const idUser = useParams().id const [deleteUser, setDeleteUser] = useState() useEffect(async() => { const action = await service.delete(`http://localhost:3001/user/profile/delete/${idUser}`) console.log("este es el detail", action) setDeleteUser(action.user._id) }, []) useEffect(() => { usuarioAutenticado() }, []) if(!usuario) return null; return ( <>

This is Your profile

Name: {usuario.name}

Email: {usuario.email}

Address: {usuario.address}

Mobile: {usuario.mobile}

Check

View Your Cart
View Store
{/* Delete Profile */}

EDIT YOUR PROFILE

By signing up, you agree to our Terms, Data Policy and Cookies Policy.

) }
